downloadTitle: Estimate performance and capacity requirements for Microsoft Search Server 2010 Express

detailsSection: This white paper discusses capacity management and planning information for Microsoft Search Server 2010 Express. It includes the following information: test environment specifications, such as hardware, farm topology, and configuration; the workload used for data generation, including the number and class of users, and farm usage characteristics; test farm dataset, including database contents, search indexes and external data sources; health and performance data specific to the tested environment; test data and recommendations for how to determine the hardware and configuration you need to deploy a similar environment, and how to optimize the environment for appropriate capacity and performance characteristics.
